movies.original_title: ตี๋ใหญ่ ฤกษ์ดาวโจร
movies.overview: In 1980s Bangkok, a wily thief stages a series of daring heists, baffling the authorities and the public — until one cop sets out to take him down.
movies.tagline: Meet the "King of Thieves", whose life is coming to an end.
movies.title: Tee Yai: Born to Be Bad

movies.original_title: หมู่บ้านโคกะโหลก
movies.overview: A terrifying serial murder spree grips Kogaloak village, with horrific injuries on male victims. Police face local legends and hidden secrets as they investigate. The latest victim, is taken for autopsy, intensifying fear. Officer and his team conduct a covert investigation, but the death toll rises. Villagers suspect newcomers have awakened a vengeful ghost. Is it real or a clever killer?
movies.title: Ko Ga Loak Village

movies.original_title: วิญญาณเลขที่ 13
movies.overview: Bussaba, a volleyball player who enjoyed bullying others, was found dead by hanging in a gym, causing chaos and horror among other team members.
movies.tagline: Attack me, attack back! play fair!
movies.title: Attack 13

movies.original_title: เพราะเราคู่กัน THE MOVIE
movies.overview: To avoid unwanted attention, a college student asks the most popular guy on campus to pretend to date him — but their fake feelings become real love.
movies.title: 2gether: The Movie

movies.original_title: Die Tomorrow
movies.overview: Die Tomorrow entails six short segments about the impermanence of life, all inspired by deaths reported in Thai daily newspapers.
movies.title: Die Tomorrow

movies.original_title: แม่ซื้อ
movies.overview: Ing is sent to Pinijkhun Reform School, an all-girls facility on a remote island. The only rule here is that everyone must obey orders.
movies.title: Host

movies.original_title: 404 สุขีนิรันดร์..Run Run
movies.overview: Nakrob, a young real estate swindler, discovers an abandoned hillside hotel by the beach. Seeing an opportunity, he decides to turn it into a luxury hotel scam.
movies.tagline: This hotel is run by a ghost who enjoys making people run away!
movies.title: 404 Run Run

movies.original_title: แม่
movies.overview: Drama about a mother and her 4 children.
movies.title: The Mother

movies.original_title: Love เลย 101
movies.overview: A romance against huge generation gap between a barely pensioned policeman Daeng and a senior high school girl. The thirty-year gap makes their relationship difficult but they will try to prove their true love together.
movies.tagline: Age does not matter in true love.
movies.title: Love 101

movies.original_title: เขาชุมทอง คะนองชุมโจร
movies.overview: At the tail end of World War II, a bandit leader and his crew go up against his sworn enemy and the Japanese army to rob a train full of gold.
movies.title: Gold Rush Gang

movies.original_title: หลานม่า
movies.overview: M, a university dropout low on money and luck, volunteers to take care of his terminally ill grandmother, in the hope of pocketing an inheritance.
movies.tagline: Never underestimate a grandma's love for her family.
movies.title: How to Make Millions Before Grandma Dies

movies.original_title: Midnight Reminiscence
movies.overview: On the New Year's Eve, an ex-child star sets up a date with a broken-hearted high school girl to relive his glorious moments in the past.
movies.tagline: HE whose future has already passed and SHE whose future will never come.
movies.title: Midnight Reminiscence

movies.original_title: Sakda (Rousseau)
movies.overview: Created in celebration of the three-hundredth anniversary of the birth of Jean-Jacques Rousseau, this short essay centres on a monologue delivered by a reincarnation of the philosopher in twenty-first century Thailand.
movies.tagline: A body in search of a name. A voice echoing along the Mekong River.
movies.title: Sakda (Rousseau)

movies.original_title: Bittersweet Chocolate
movies.overview: A mother surprises her son with a birthday treat – an ultra-dark and bittersweet chocolate cake. Its mysterious taste makes strange things happen.
movies.title: Bittersweet Chocolate

movies.original_title: ลักกันวันตาย
movies.overview: Two bank employees steal from a dead woman's account and unwittingly entangle themselves in Pattaya's criminal underworld.
movies.title: Everybody Loves Me When I'm Dead

movies.original_title: ปากกัด ตีนถีบ
movies.overview: In a fight for survival against a horrifying army of zombies, a former Muay Thai fighter must use skill, speed and grit to save his girlfriend.
movies.tagline: This barehanded fighter will knock down a horde of zombies.
movies.title: Ziam

movies.original_title: ซ้ำวัน กับ Someone
movies.overview: Trapped in a time loop, a museum curator relives the day everything goes wrong and must navigate beyond her perfect life to break free.
movies.title: Same Day with Someone

movies.original_title: หลวงพี่แจ๊ส 5G
movies.overview: A good eloquence monk travelled to Bangkok searching a boy father and ended up in a strange temple which reveal him another side of religious that he never experience
movies.title: Joking Jazz 5G

movies.original_title: Stratosphere
movies.overview: The Mockumentary short about Stratosphere, an all girl Thai group. Companion film to Where We Belong.
movies.title: Stratosphere

movies.original_title: ฟู้ดทรัค ลัก (รัก) หมูเด้ง
movies.overview: Jake and Bobby, the art director accompanying the truck, remain unaware that their vehicle will ultimately lead Mamiew to confront his own past all over again.
movies.tagline: Love is on the menu but every recipe has its secrets.
movies.title: Food Truck: Stolen Love... and Moo Deng

last_episode_to_air.name: Lost and Found
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kae is furious! After being betrayed by Bell, she ignites her vengeance and begins her mission to take down Claire.

tv_shows.name: ClaireBell
tv_shows.original_name: คลั่ง/รัก/นักโทษ
tv_shows.overview: Fate led Bell, an unfortunate young woman, into prison, where she had to struggle for survival alone, without hope. That was until Claire, a mysterious female inmate, appeared to help her. And from that moment on... the encounter between these two souls began to fill this dark and desolate place with a small glimmer of light—one that gradually grew into love.

tv_shows.overview: Dr. Prem, a flawless heart surgeon, faces chaos when her wedding is ruined by actress Pat. What begins as resentment soon turns into unexpected attraction after a fateful kiss reveals deeper feelings between them.

tv_shows.overview: Babe, a race car driver with unmatched talent, falls for newcomer Charlie, but hidden secrets threaten their passionate romance and racing dreams.

seasons.name: Pitbabe
seasons.overview: Charlie wants to be a racecar driver but he doesn't have a racecar of his own. The only solution he comes up with is to make a bizarre agreement with king of the raceway Babe, nicknamed Pit Babe. Even stranger, Babe agrees to help Charlie realize his dream.

seasons.name: Pitbabe II
seasons.overview: One year after Tony’s death, a hidden world of powers emerges. As Charlie fights to expose those exploiting them, his bond with Babe is tested when they uncover a deadly conspiracy led by Tony, who isn’t as dead as they believed.

tv_shows.name: Dangerous Queen
tv_shows.original_name: คนโปรดของควีน
tv_shows.overview:
Bonita spends her time supporting her mother who suffers from alcohol and gambling addiction. In addition to this, her neighbour "Kem" pursues her relentlessly even though she only sees him as a friend.

Her life takes a surprising turn when she goes to a bar and meets "Queen", a high-society woman from a prominent family. Queen helps Bonita escape her mother's abuse and they face various challenges before they become each other's favourite.

"In my life, I have only one favourite person."

tv_shows.name: DMD Friendship The Reality
tv_shows.original_name: DMD Friendship The Reality
tv_shows.overview: A group of eight Domundi artist trainees come together in this reality show where they'll develop their skills and compete in a series of missions. All the while, they'll be working on their chemistry in the search for a partner they'll be compatible with both on and off screen. The prize is a the opportunity to perform as the lead couple in a new Domundi Y series.
